l10n_nren_maint_msg.en: You can now configure the portal more directly. At the moment, the only option is setting it in 'Maintenance-mode' for your NREN.

l10n_nren_maint_toggle.en: Toggle the maintenance-mode. Check the box to set the portal in maintenance-mode for all users for this NREN. Only NREN-admins will be able to view the portal, and only this page.
